title: We're Going on a Bear Hunt
description: An adrenaline-pumping racetrack, augmented with sensory digital elements.
author: Michael Rosen
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0gyI6ykDwds

content.caption: Users enter the experience through “exiting” the main house.
The racetrack is before them and they must start the race.

They run down along the track until they race their first challenge. Here they race through the river crossing challenge being very careful to only jump on fully formed lily pads as to not fall in the river.
Racers move around to the snowstorm challenge. Here the racer must place 150 snowflakes to make the LIDAR curtain turn off so they can run through.
Racers move towards and head into the bear cave tunnel maze, here they will need to find there was through a dimly lit series of tunnels whilst being followed by the bear growling audio.

Here we see the racers enter the final leg of the race where they must compete in a foot race to get back to the safety of the house in doing so they are chased once again by the growling bear audio and some bear claw projections on the track behind them.
The race is now finished as the racer cross the finish line and they now exit through “entering” back into the safety of the house knowing they have successfully escaped the bear.

All the while along the parents have been able to view their children interacting with the space from the safety of the external viewing area which is in keeping of the theme and are styled to look like the internal features of a house.
